languages.text: "Я передумал{mf||а}. Всю жизнь нести бремя собственных преступлений — достаточное наказание".

traits.locale_text: "Я передумал{mf||а}. Всю жизнь нести бремя собственных преступлений — достаточное наказание".

languages.text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."
languages.original_text: "Я передумал{mf||а}. Всю жизнь нести бремя собственных преступлений — достаточное наказание".

traits.locale_text: "I have changed my decision. Carrying the burden of your own crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."
"I have changed my decision. Carrying the burden of your own crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."
"I have changed my decision. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."
"I have changed my decision. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."
"I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."
"I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

languages.text: 「気が変わった。人生最後の日まで罪を背負って生きることが、お前への裁きとしては十分だ」
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

traits.locale_text: 「気が変わった。人生最後の日まで罪を背負って生きることが、お前への裁きとしては十分だ」

languages.text: « J'ai changé d'avis. Porter le poids de vos crimes jusqu'à la fin de vos jours sera un châtiment bien suffisant. »
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai changé d'avis. Porter le poids de vos crimes jusqu'à la fin de vos jours sera un châtiment bien suffisant. »

languages.text: “我改主意了。你就背负着你的罪行，直到你生命的最后一刻为止吧。这样的惩罚才适合你。”
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

traits.locale_text: “我改主意了。你就背负着你的罪行，直到你生命的最后一刻为止吧。这样的惩罚才适合你。”

languages.text: "Ich habe es mir anders überlegt. Die Bürde Eurer Verbrechen bis zum Ende Eurer Tage zu tragen, ist Strafe genug."
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

traits.locale_text: "Ich revidiere meine Entscheidung. Die Bürde Eurer Verbrechen bis zum Ende Eurer Tage zu tragen, ist Strafe genug."

languages.text: «He cambiado de parecer. Llevar la pesada carga de haber cometido tales crímenes hasta el fin de sus días es castigo suficiente».
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

traits.locale_text: «He cambiado de idea. Llevar la pesada carga de haber cometido tales crímenes hasta el fin de sus días es castigo suficiente».

languages.text: "Fikrimi değiştirdim. Suçlarının yükünü ölene kadar taşımak yeterince büyük bir ceza olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. Carrying the burden of your crimes until the end of your days is punishment enough."

traits.locale_text: "Fikrimi değiştirdim. Suçlarının yükünü ölene kadar taşımak yeterince büyük bir ceza olacaktır."
